thread.section_title: Hotel Newton - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Modest and affordable, clean and comfortable
thread.title_full: Modest and affordable, clean and comfortable - Review of Hotel Newton, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: meijiq
title: Modest and affordable, clean and comfortable
text:
Although the hotel is located in a residential neighborhood, it is right on the express line of the subway, just two stops away from Times Square. It is modest, clean, affordable, and fills the bill. Nearby are a variety of eateries.
Room Tip: Choose a room on an upper floor so that you do not hear street noise. See more room tips
